"Zidane y va marquer" bụ abụ nke onye France TV na redio Sébastien Cauet dere, wepụtara na July 3, 2006
Dabere na egwu Salif Keita na Martin Solveig's hit single "Madan", parody a na-ezo aka na Zinedine Zidane na ndị egwuregwu ndị ọzọ nke otu bọọlụ French na-asọmpi na 2006 FIFA World Cup.
Site na Mee 2006, abụ ahụ gosipụtara na mmemme redio nke Cauet kwadoro kwa ụtụtụ
Ụda ahụ na-atọ ọchị ma na-ezo aka na Zidane dị ka onye nzọpụta
Okwu ndị ahụ kwukwara na Jérôme Rothen na Nicolas Anelka na-ahọrọghị ya na nhọrọ a na-atụghị anya ya nke Pascal Chimbonda
Na mbipụta mbụ, Zidane merụrụ ahụ wee hapụ ebe ahụ ka ọ bụrụ Claude Makélélé, mana mgbe egwuregwu dị n'etiti France na China gasịrị, a gbanwere okwu ahụ iji gosipụta mmerụ ahụ Djibril Cissé.
Egwu ahụ nwetara ewu ewu na mmeri ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba France meriri na iko mba ụwa, bụ́ ndị a na-abụ n'okporo ámá n'oge ememe egwuregwu
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, Cauet kpebiri idekọ abụ ahụ dị ka otu, nke Universal Music bipụtara
Nkwụsị ahụ pụtara na jingles mgbasa ozi na TF1 tupu egwuregwu
Agbanwere egwu ndị ahụ iji kwe ka mwepụta nke egwu ahụ (dịka ọmụmaatụ, ehichapụrụ ahịrị na-akpọ Sony's PlayStation Portable).
